title: Lignocellulosic biomass valorisation: A review of feedstocks, processes and potential value chains, and their implications for the decision-making process
content:

Several studies have reported on the importance of transforming the current fossil-based economy into a bio-economy. Lignocellulosic biomass, as the most abundant renewable feedstock, has a high potential; however, in...
